title: We wanted buff to Mages not Straight up numbers nerf and mini games and toys for them
body:
Many Ap mages champion have been completely gutted.
Do you expect us to run pure Magic pen runes to do decent amount of damages?
Remember back when the item cost was cheaper?
Riot Logic here.
We made item cheaper and thus we need to nerf their AP and mana regen too.
Thats because you guys already increased they cost before for no reason.
and Rabadon deathcap still cost 3800 Gold?
LIKE WTF? Do I need to snowball get 10 kills to finally get it?
You guys are SEJUANING every mages right now.

replies.body:
Riot didn't go into the mage update with the intention to buff numbers across the board; they wanted to create distinctions between the mage champions so that they had well defined niches. In the past, mages were most often picked according to which one of them did the most damage, which they didn't like. 

Why would they even plan to just hand out buffs?

Ehh i think annie needs to be in S teir...... because the new tibbers interaction just destroys people atm  and yeah thats true tho.. lux i dont think will be Steir much longer with these new changes...... give it time before u start judging...... the new changes just hit so let the new meta reform and then judge then
